name: Megatouch Mobile Arcade
summary:
The popular touch panel Megatouch games, found in bars across the nation, are now available on your mobile phone!

Enjoy Q-shot, Box Drop, and 11 Up all in one application. These games, previously available only in bars, can now be played anytime and anywhere! Megatouch Mobile Arcade is only one part of the series, continue the fun with new chapters coming in the future!
